text: Iṉṉum uṅkaḷuṭaiya celvaṅkaḷō, uṅkaḷuṭaiya makkaḷō (uṅkaḷukkut takuti koṭuttu) uṅkaḷai nam'maḷavil neruṅki vaikka kūṭiyavarkaḷ allar. Āṉāl evar īmāṉ koṇṭu, sālihāṉa (nalla) amal ceykiṉṟārō attakaiyōrkku, avarkaḷ ceytataṟku iraṭṭippu naṟkūli uṇṭu; mēlum avarkaḷ (cuvaṉapatiyiṉ) uṉṉatamāṉa māḷikaikaḷil nim'matiyuṭaṉ iruppārkaḷ
